abstract: Lehman Brothers apologized for plagiarizing parts of a Sanford C. Bernstein & Co. research report, in a move that underscores a continuing debate over the state of Wall Street’s research, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Lehman Brothers apologized for plagiarizing parts of a Sanford C. Bernstein & Co. research report, in a move that underscores a continuing debate over the state of Wall Street’s research, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Lehman Said to Apologize for Pilfering Bernstein Research
